= !ProjectName.TimerJobs Detail ==

1 This project contains all the Timer Jobs classes used to run Timer Jobs in !SharePoint.Below Class Diagram show the classes used in !ProjectName.TimerJobs project.  <br>

http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Timer.Class2.png


 Below is the description of classes shown in above class diagram

 <b>!SampleTimerJob</b> - This is sample timer job class inheriting from SPJobDefinition class. The Execute method will fire whenever you timer job service will run. Timer job will deployed on specific interval. You can refer UI project TimerJob Feature for How to deploy Timer Job in !SharePoint
